com.bigdata.util

Class Bits

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bigdata.util.Bits

  • public class Bits
extends Object
    Simple helper class to work with bits inside a byte. Useful for classes that have a lot of boolean properties or pointers to enums that can be more compactly represented as a series of bit flags. See SPO.
    Author:
    mikepersonick

      • set

        public static byte set(byte bits,
       int i,
       boolean bit)
        Set a bit inside a byte.
        Parameters:
        bits - the original byte
        i - the bit index (0 through 7)
        bit - the bit value
        Returns:
        the new byte

      • get

        public static boolean get(byte bits,
          int i)
        Get a bit from inside a byte.
        Parameters:
        bits - the byte
        i - the bit index (0 through 7)
        Returns:
        the bit value

      • mask

        public static byte mask(byte bits,
        int... m)
        Get a new byte, masking off all but the bits specified by m.
        Parameters:
        bits - the original byte
        m - the bits to keep, all others will be masked
        Returns:
        the new byte

      • toString

        public static String toString(byte bits)
        Useful for debugging.
        Parameters:
        bits - the byte
        Returns:
        the unsigned binary string representation
